LanguageData.VFEI_Tunneling.textEnemy: Insects of the {1} are tunneling towards you! They will break through in a few seconds and attack!
LanguageData.VFEI_Burrow.textEnemy:
Insects of the {1} are tunneling towards you! They will break through in a few seconds and attack!
It seems their plan is to open up tunnels, allowing larger swarms to crawl through. Destroy their burrows as soon as possible, as they will never stop sending waves of insects.
LanguageData.VFEI_Meteorite.textEnemy: A shower of meteorites is striking the local area. It seems they are infested with hives belonging to {1}! They will attack immediately.
LanguageData.VFEI_GigalocustSwarm.textEnemy: A number of gigalocusts belonging to {1} are landing around your base. Their only intention is to kill and they plan to attack immediately.
